titles.title: Building and Construction Industry Labor Law Amendments of 1993
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to increase the stability of collective bargaining in the building and construction industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Building and Construction Industry Labor Law Amendments of 1993 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act, with respect to collective bargaining in the building and construction industry, to add requirements relating to the definition of single employer, the scope of duty to bargain, and prehire agreements.
